name.en: On That Day, We Met a Girl
name.jp: On That Day, We Met a Girl
name.zh_cn: 那天,我们与少女相遇了

desc.en: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.jp: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃井为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃井为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。

desc.en: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.jp: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.zh_cn: 三人跑进了工厂里，发现机器人不再跟随。就在这时，设施里的系统开始识别三人身份，并认出了老师，给三人发放了通行权限。三人从地板打开的门掉了下去。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第二十七首曲子，尤其用于玩家输掉一场战斗后。

desc.en: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.
desc.jp: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的爱丽丝，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。绿可怜爱丽丝，便决定将她带回千禧年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，爱丽丝因与老师接触而醒了过来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的爱丽丝，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。绿可怜爱丽丝，便决定将她带回千年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，爱丽丝因与老师接触而醒了过来。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的爱丽丝，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。绿可怜爱丽丝，便决定将她带回千年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，爱丽丝因与老师接触而醒了过来。

desc.en: Momoi took Aris back to the club room and Midori was shocked. Knowing barely anything, Aris started tossing the stuffs in the club room, like putting controllers and game consoles into month. Momoi then revealed her plan: she wanted to let Aris pretend to be a student at here, solving the club member number problem.
desc.jp: Momoi took Aris back to the club room and Midori was shocked. Knowing barely anything, Aris started tossing the stuffs in the club room, like putting controllers and game consoles into month. Momoi then revealed her plan: she wanted to let Aris pretend to be a student at here, solving the club member number problem.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃井随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千禧年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃井随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。

desc.en: The Game Development Department makes it to a rundown factory. As if by instinct, Aris is drawn to the computer which contains G.BIBLE. She's able to download the data onto her gaming device...
desc.jp: The Game Development Department makes it to a rundown factory. As if by instinct, Aris is drawn to the computer which contains G.BIBLE. She's able to download the data onto her gaming device...
desc.zh_cn: 游戏开发部一行人抵达目的地——位于废墟的工厂。爱丽丝在那里靠直觉找到储存<G.Bible>的电脑，并且成功把资料下载到游戏机里。

desc.en: Everyone made the way to the factory. Aris suddenly remembered something and went away on her own. They followed Aris and found a computer running a system called "Divi: Sion".
desc.jp: Everyone made the way to the factory. Aris suddenly remembered something and went away on her own. They followed Aris and found a computer running a system called "Divi: Sion".
desc.zh_cn: 众人到达了工厂，但爱丽丝却突然记起了什么，自顾自的行动。众人跟随着爱丽丝，找到了一台搭载着“Divi: Sion”系统的电脑。

desc.en: The computer recognized Aris but was about to shut down due to low battery, with data on board going to be lost as well. To get the G.Bible saved on it, Momoi gave away her game console and her game saves. At last the data was secured, but it required a password to access. Momoi complained loudly and unintentionally attracted the robots.
desc.jp: The computer recognized Aris but was about to shut down due to low battery, with data on board going to be lost as well. To get the G.Bible saved on it, Momoi gave away her game console and her game saves. At last the data was secured, but it required a password to access. Momoi complained loudly and unintentionally attracted the robots.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 电脑认出了爱丽丝，但突然电量不足即将关机，数据被毁在即；为了得到其存储的《G.Bible》，桃井献出了自己的游戏机与存档。数据得以保存，但需密码才可访问；桃井大声抱怨，结果引来了机器人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 电脑认出了爱丽丝，但突然电量不足即将关机，数据被毁在即；为了得到其存储的《G.Bible》，桃井献出了自己的游戏机与存档。数据得以保存，但需密码才可访问；桃井大声抱怨，结果引来了机器人。

desc.en: The Game Development Department and Sensei finally find Aris. Calling herself a demon lord, Aris is hesitant to return for fear of hurting others. Encouraged by everyone's supportive words that it's up to her to decide who she wants to be, Aris finally draws the proof of a warrior: Supernova, the Sword of Light.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department and Sensei finally find Aris. Calling herself a demon lord, Aris is hesitant to return for fear of hurting others. Encouraged by everyone's supportive words that it's up to her to decide who she wants to be, Aris finally draws the proof of a warrior: Supernova, the Sword of Light.
desc.zh_cn: 游戏开发部和老师终于遇见爱丽丝了。爱丽丝说自己是魔王，自己会害大家受伤，因此犹豫是否该回去。但大家都说自己才是自己真正的主人，于是爱丽丝终于拔出了勇者的证明「光之剑：Supernova」。

desc.en: Sensei ang the GDD arrived at the Aris' deep consciousness, and there they met Aris and Key. The GDD wanted to bring back Aris, but Key appeared suddenly and reminded "princess" of what she had witnessed.
desc.jp: Sensei ang the GDD arrived at the Aris' deep consciousness, and there they met Aris and Key. The GDD wanted to bring back Aris, but Key appeared suddenly and reminded "princess" of what she had witnessed.
desc.zh_cn: 老师和游戏开发部一行人来到了爱丽丝的意识深处，在那他们见到了爱丽丝与Key。开发部想要带爱丽丝回去，但Key突然出现，并重新提醒“公主”她所见到的一切。

desc.en: On screen, it showed scenes of C&C being besieged by AMAS, Neru confronting Toki, Sensei and others confronting Avant Guard but short on hands, Neru collapsing after being serverly injured - nothing but all their combat scenes. Everyone didn't understand why, but Key said that the "princess" had already knew it herself.
desc.jp: On screen, it showed scenes of C&C being besieged by AMAS, Neru confronting Toki, Sensei and others confronting Avant Guard but short on hands, Neru collapsing after being serverly injured - nothing but all their combat scenes. Everyone didn't understand why, but Key said that the "princess" had already knew it herself.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 画面上出现了被AMAS围攻的C&C、与时对峙的尼禄、面对前卫君不知所措的老师众人、尼禄负伤严重倒下的情景——都是他们战斗的身影。众人不解画面的内容，而Key则故作简单的表示，“公主”自己知道这一切。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 画面上出现了被AMAS围攻的C&C、与季对峙的宁瑠、面对前卫君不知所措的老师众人、宁瑠负伤严重倒下的情景——都是他们战斗的身影。众人不解画面的内容，而Key则故作简单的表示，“公主”自己知道这一切。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 画面上出现了被AMAS围攻的C&C、与时对峙的妮露、面对前卫君不知所措的老师众人、妮露负伤严重倒下的情景——都是他们战斗的身影。众人不解画面的内容，而Key则故作简单的表示，“公主”自己知道这一切。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: Aris thought about Rio. Aris still held no doubts against the fact that she was in fact a "demon lord", and feared that she would inflict damages on everyone again. She remembered the damage she inflicted on Momoi, the scenes of Midori and Yuzu confronting Rio, and Neru being injured - all was caused by herself, and so she should disappear.
desc.jp: Aris thought about Rio. Aris still held no doubts against the fact that she was in fact a "demon lord", and feared that she would inflict damages on everyone again. She remembered the damage she inflicted on Momoi, the scenes of Midori and Yuzu confronting Rio, and Neru being injured - all was caused by herself, and so she should disappear.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝想起了莉央。爱丽丝仍对自己是个“魔王”的概念自信不疑，害怕自己会再次给大家造成伤害。她记得自己给桃井造成的伤害，柚子和绿面对莉央时的情形，以及尼禄前辈负伤的画面——而这全都是她自己造成的，也因此她应当消失。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝想起了莉音。爱丽丝仍对自己是个“魔王”的概念自信不疑，害怕自己会再次给大家造成伤害。她记得自己给桃井造成的伤害，柚子和绿面对莉音时的情形，以及宁瑠前辈负伤的画面——而这全都是她自己造成的，也因此她应当消失。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝想起了莉央。爱丽丝仍对自己是个“魔王”的概念自信不疑，害怕自己会再次给大家造成伤害。她记得自己给桃造成的伤害，柚子和绿面对莉央时的情形，以及妮露前辈负伤的画面——而这全都是她自己造成的，也因此她应当消失。

desc.en: Momoi suddenly mentioned TSC2 made by everyone and its achievements like winning the Millenium Prize. Momoi didn't believe Aris' sayings, but she believed these facts, believing that Aris was not like that, and stressed the role of Aris in the team. Aris still couldn't understand why they would come to rescue her, and Yuzu pointed it out sharply: just like Aris had said before, the hero would not give up companions. They also mentioned that, no matter "demon lord" or "hero" she may be, they were nothing but only titles, and choosing to be which could only be decided by Aris.
desc.jp: Momoi suddenly mentioned TSC2 made by everyone and its achievements like winning the Millenium Prize. Momoi didn't believe Aris' sayings, but she believed these facts, believing that Aris was not like that, and stressed the role of Aris in the team. Aris still couldn't understand why they would come to rescue her, and Yuzu pointed it out sharply: just like Aris had said before, the hero would not give up companions. They also mentioned that, no matter "demon lord" or "hero" she may be, they were nothing but only titles, and choosing to be which could only be decided by Aris.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井突然提到了爱丽丝与大家制作的TSC2，提到了它斩获了千禧年大赏的种种成就。桃井不相信爱丽丝说的话，但她相信这些事实，相信爱丽丝绝非如此，强调了爱丽丝在团队中的作用。爱丽丝仍对所有人来拯救她而不解，而柚子则一针见血的指了出来：爱丽丝自己都说过，勇者绝不会放弃同伴。同时他们还提到，无论是魔王还是勇者都只是称号与头衔，真正想成为谁只有爱丽丝能决定。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井突然提到了爱丽丝与大家制作的TSC2，提到了它斩获了千年大赏的种种成就。桃井不相信爱丽丝说的话，但她相信这些事实，相信爱丽丝绝非如此，强调了爱丽丝在团队中的作用。爱丽丝仍对所有人来拯救她而不解，而柚子则一针见血的指了出来：爱丽丝自己都说过，勇者绝不会放弃同伴。同时他们还提到，无论是魔王还是勇者都只是称号与头衔，真正想成为谁只有爱丽丝能决定。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃突然提到了爱丽丝与大家制作的TSC2，提到了它斩获了千年大赏的种种成就。桃不相信爱丽丝说的话，但她相信这些事实，相信爱丽丝绝非如此，强调了爱丽丝在团队中的作用。爱丽丝仍对所有人来拯救她而不解，而柚子则一针见血的指了出来：爱丽丝自己都说过，勇者绝不会放弃同伴。同时他们还提到，无论是魔王还是勇者都只是称号与头衔，真正想成为谁只有爱丽丝能决定。

desc.en: Everyone wanted to hear Aris' own true words. Being accused as a "demon lord", Aris thought that she would not be able to return to the club, to live and go out adventures with others - but Sensei denied it. Aris hesitated a little, said that she wanted to be a hero, that she dreamed of continuing adventures with GDD and Sensei. Everyone agreed and just said: "Of course. Because we are the Game Development Department!"
desc.jp: Everyone wanted to hear Aris' own true words. Being accused as a "demon lord", Aris thought that she would not be able to return to the club, to live and go out adventures with others - but Sensei denied it. Aris hesitated a little, said that she wanted to be a hero, that she dreamed of continuing adventures with GDD and Sensei. Everyone agreed and just said: "Of course. Because we are the Game Development Department!"
desc.zh_cn: 大家都想听听爱丽丝的真心话。爱丽丝因自己已经被冠以“魔王”的身份，自己认定自己无法再回到社团、与大家冒险生活——但老师否定了这一点。爱丽丝犹豫了一下，说出自己也想成为勇者，与游戏开发部和老师将冒险继续下去的梦想。而众人则表示——“因为我们可是，游戏开发部啊！”

desc.en: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.jp: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.zh_cn: 官方游戏开发部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》中的片尾曲，由游戏开发部四人演唱。该歌曲由两分钟及四分钟两个版本，其中前者用于动画末尾曲与游戏内第二篇第二章的结尾曲。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.

desc.en: As Key was suppressed in Aris' consciousness, the Divi: Sion army in the city began to disappear, and the Eridu control center was back at normal. Rio was surprised that Sensei and the GDD actually did it, but Sensei only replied that, it was something that GDD could make. Eventually, the three at GDD reunited with Aris.
desc.jp: As Key was suppressed in Aris' consciousness, the Divi: Sion army in the city began to disappear, and the Eridu control center was back at normal. Rio was surprised that Sensei and the GDD actually did it, but Sensei only replied that, it was something that GDD could make. Eventually, the three at GDD reunited with Aris.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 由于爱丽丝意识中的Key被压制，城中的Divi:Sion军队开始消失，埃里都控制中心也恢复正常。莉央惊讶于老师等人居然真的做到了，而老师只是轻描淡写地表示这是游戏开发部所能做到的。最终，游戏开发部三人与爱丽丝团聚。

desc.zh_cn: 英美和老师调查了捕捉到十字神名信号的地方。探索后没有获得任何成果，和阳葵预料中的完全不一样。但经过调查后，老师留意到了充满违和感的贩卖机，并从中发现了十字神名的本体。

desc.en:
為了成為正式的社團，忍術研究部決定協助百鬼夜行和格黑娜的交流會。
然而這兩所學園的交流會想必無法風平浪靜地結束……
面對眼前各式各樣的問題，少女們得出的答案究竟會是什麼呢！？

desc.en: 為了復原渡假勝地而來到控制室的對策委員會，在那裡發現了名為渡假勝地防禦系統的陌生裝置。認為這樣一來就能不用再害怕頭盔團和若藻而啟動防衛系統的對策委員會，卻因為自己同樣沒有登錄在防衛系統中也受到了攻擊──
desc.jp: 為了復原渡假勝地而來到控制室的對策委員會，在那裡發現了名為渡假勝地防禦系統的陌生裝置。認為這樣一來就能不用再害怕頭盔團和若藻而啟動防衛系統的對策委員會，卻因為自己同樣沒有登錄在防衛系統中也受到了攻擊──
desc.zh_cn: 为了复原渡假胜地而来到控制室的对策委员会，在那里发现了名为渡假胜地防御系统的陌生设备。认为这样一来就能不用再害怕头盔团和若藻而启动防卫系统的对策委员会，却因为自己同样没有登录在防卫系统中也受到了攻击──

name.en: 阿拜多斯渡假勝地復原對策委員會
name.jp: 阿拜多斯渡假勝地復原對策委員會
name.zh_cn: 阿拜多斯渡假胜地复原对策委员会

desc.en:
對策委員會一行人意外地前往了無人島的渡假勝地。
然而等待著他們的卻是已經成為廢墟的渡假勝地、頭盔團的襲擊，以及若藻！究竟對策委員會能否順利度過暑假呢？
desc.jp:
對策委員會一行人意外地前往了無人島的渡假勝地。
然而等待著他們的卻是已經成為廢墟的渡假勝地、頭盔團的襲擊，以及若藻！究竟對策委員會能否順利度過暑假呢？
desc.zh_cn:
对策委员会一行人意外地前往了无人岛的渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是已经成为废墟的渡假胜地、头盔团的袭击，以及若藻！究竟对策委员会能否顺利度过暑假呢？

desc.en: 一行人下一個前往的是由「將敗者引向破滅的白耳怪物們」營運的渡假勝地。跟著就像是被什麼附身一樣搭上船的人後，那裡卻是「祕密．甲蟲皇后大會」的會場。聽說於大會優勝的話，就能回收契約書的一行人，借助菲娜和楓的力量挑戰了甲蟲皇后大會。
desc.jp: 一行人下一個前往的是由「將敗者引向破滅的白耳怪物們」營運的渡假勝地。跟著就像是被什麼附身一樣搭上船的人後，那裡卻是「祕密．甲蟲皇后大會」的會場。聽說於大會優勝的話，就能回收契約書的一行人，借助菲娜和楓的力量挑戰了甲蟲皇后大會。
desc.zh_cn: 一行人下一个前往的是由「将败者引向破灭的白耳怪物们」营运的渡假胜地。跟着就像是被什么附身一样搭上船的人后，那里却是「秘密．甲虫皇后大会」的会场。听说于大会优胜的话，就能回收契约书的一行人，借助菲娜和枫的力量挑战了甲虫皇后大会。

desc.en:
為了開啟新的事業「海之家」，百夜堂一行人來到了渡假勝地。
然而等待著他們的卻是渡假勝地之間的權利爭奪「Resort・Battle Royal」。
究竟靜子能否順利守護「海之家」呢──！？百夜堂嶄新的戰鬥，即刻開始。
desc.jp:
為了開啟新的事業「海之家」，百夜堂一行人來到了渡假勝地。
然而等待著他們的卻是渡假勝地之間的權利爭奪「Resort・Battle Royal」。
究竟靜子能否順利守護「海之家」呢──！？百夜堂嶄新的戰鬥，即刻開始。
desc.zh_cn:

究竟静子能否顺利守护「海之家」呢──！？百夜堂崭新的战斗，即刻开始。
